articles.description: 据 K33  Research 报告，比特币现在的波动性低于纳斯达克、标准普尔 500 指数和黄金，这可能预示着交易量的激增即将到来。报告指出，当比特币的波动性降低时，通常会被高波动性期跟随，这表明当前的低波动性期可能很快结束，未来可能会看到更大的价格波动。K33 的高级分析师Vetle Lunde…

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
Re https://twitter.com/AurtrianAjian/status/1686379305520234497

Ajian: 我听过离谱的事情，但不知道你们可以这么离谱。
请停止参与 “BRC20” 打新，并且，抵制它。
你不应该再参加，因为从技术上来说这种落后的东西必定会被淘汰。你应该抵制它，因为它会造成 UTXO 集的膨胀，其应用的实际后果已近乎粉尘攻击。
https://domo-2.gitbook.io/brc-20-experiment/

Frank: It's not really like any other reveal.
DeGods Season III will have the same traits as the current DeGods in a reimagined style/aesthetic.
The reason for most post-reveal dips is when people reveal commons and floor them.
Season III is not random. It's also non-dillutive.

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
Re 据 Beosin Alert，LeetSwap 上的 axlUSD/WETH 交易对遭价格操纵攻击，损失约 62 万美元。该攻击利用了配对合约中的 _transferFeesSupportingTaxTokens 函数，允许任何人在配对合约中转账 axlUSD，从而导致代币价格上涨。然后攻击者就可以出售代币以获取利润。
https://twitter.com/BeosinAlert/status/1686217193980342272?s=20

Beosin Alert: The axlUSD/WETH pair of @LeetSwap on BASE was subject to a price manipulation attack, with losses of ~$620,000. 
The attack exploited the _transferFeesSupportingTaxTokens function in the pair contract, which allows anyone to transfer axlUSD in the pair contract, leading to an…

olimpio: There's a risk of a black swan event in DeFi.
As per Defillama, if CRV drops below $0.37, there's 300M CRV to liquidate in Aave -most from Curve's founder
The problem? There's not a single Exchange or DeFi protocol where one can sell such a large CRV amount.
Risks explained 🧵

articles.author: 8848 社区（8848 Community）
articles.description:
RT Multichain (Previously Anyswap)
The lockup assets on the Multichain MPC address have been moved to an unknown address abnormally. 
The team is not sure what happened and is currently investigating. 
It is recommended that all users suspend the use of Multichain services and revoke all contract approvals…
